titleStmt.title: [Entries from the Cherokee Supreme Court Docket, 1823-1834, New Echota] 1827 Oct. 24 : a machine readable transcription of an image

publicationStmt.publisher: University of Tennessee Special Collections Library

availability.p: This work is the property of the Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN. It may be used freely by individuals for research, teaching, and personal use as long as this statement of availability is included in the text. For all other use contact the Tennessee State Library and Archives, 403 Seventh Avenue North, Nashville, TN 37243-0312. (615) 741-2764.

bibl.title: [Entries from the Cherokee Supreme Court Docket, 1823-1834, New Echota] 1827 Oct. 24
bibl.note: This is an excerpt from the Cherokee Supreme Court docket for the years 1823 to 1834. The Cherokee Supreme Court convened annually in New Echota beginning on the second Monday in October and lasting three weeks. This is from the Wednesday October 24, 1827 session of court, during which a series of civil cases were heard. The costs of the cases are described below. Entries from this Supreme Court docket cover items ch100-ch163.

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text controlled with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

div1.head: Wednesday 24th.
div1.p: Court met according to adjournment Present

The Cour find for the plaintiff
Cost of Appeal$.60
Witness The Waggon 11 days at 73 Cents pr. day$8.25
Tekuneeskee 8 do.6.00
The Woman 11 do.8.25

Satisfied, and execution returned by Jos M Lynch Nl. Marshal, May 15th 1829
J Martin

The Court find for against the defendant Talonstiskee alone for fifty dollars
Cost of appeal$3.00
Youg Wolf 16 days12.00
The Court find for the defendant

Betsey Springston
vs
John Walker Jr
The Court find for the defendants 21
Court is adjourned untill tomorrow 9 Oclock
